user-prompt-submit-hook.command: bash -c 'if [ -f STATUS.log ]; then sed -i "s/Last Updated:.*/Last Updated: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)/" STATUS.log && /home/k1/public/update_project_status.sh > /dev/null 2>&1; fi'
user-prompt-submit-hook.description: Auto-update STATUS.log timestamp and sync master project status
